titles.title: You're Calling Me To Lay Aside

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
D
You're calling me to lay aside
The worries of my day
To quiet down my busy mind
And find a hiding place
You are worthy - You are worthy

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
I open up my heart
And let my spirit worship yours
I open up my mouth
And let a song of praise come forth
You are worthy - You are worthy

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Of a childlike faith
And of my honest praise
And of my unashamed love

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Of a holy life
And of my sacrifice
And of my unashamed love
You are worthy - You are worthy
